about_the_game:
Gameplay
LightBear: Grizzelda Returns is a randomly generated action RPG whackathon with heavy Rogue-like elements. Players will lose their vision the further from the starting point they get. Don't be deceived by its appearance, this game will challenge you to no end. Watch out for 100s of randomized monsters. Collect gear a long the way to make your bear stronger.

About LightBear: Grizzelda Returns
Welcome to the sequel to LightBear with updated graphics, mechanics, story, and items!

Grizzelda is back for vengeance and LightBear must escape! Use your mind and your bears acrobatic skills in this fun adventure. Can you escape the Golden Apiary?

LightBear and LightBear: Grizzelda Returns were developed from scratch using openGL graphics library; Programmed using both 2D and 3D elements. Originally conceived as a prototype in 2009 the creator went through a long journey of pitfalls before LightBear's final completion in 2023.

Key Features:
  • Over 100 hours of gameplay
  • Billions of mazes.
  • Unlockable difficulty modes.
  • 100s of shields, armor, headwear, and weapons all randomized!
  • Simple intuitive keyboard controls.
  • Beautiful story artwork.
  • 100s of different room types.
  • 4+ different room color types.
  • 2D and 3D physics with enemies
  • Game engine built from scratch!
  • Beautiful music from professionals
  • The ultimate wholesome roguelike

Secrets:
  • Unlockable modes
  • Rare enemies
  • Secret Room Color
